data.name: FaceRig support for Intel® RealSense™
data.detailed_description:
FaceRig is now retired, new customers can check out https://store.steampowered.com/app/1364390/Animaze_by_FaceRig/


The FaceRig support for Intel® RealSense™ DLC enables you to add this sensor to the FaceRig multiple sensors update.
You can combine the Intel® RealSense™ Camera (for hands, cheeks and tongue) with another regular camera (for face tracking).

The FaceRig support for Intel® RealSense™ DLC only works if you have the Intel® RealSense™ Camera.

data.short_description: The FaceRig support for Intel® RealSense™ DLC enables you to add this sensor to the FaceRig multiple sensors update. You can combine the Intel® RealSense™ Camera (for hands, cheeks and tongue) with another regular camera (for face tracking).

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 8.1 or later
  • Processor: 4th generation (or later) i5/i7 Intel® Core™ processor
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX* 600 series or AMD Radeon* HD 7000 series (or better)
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires the Intel® RealSense™ Camera F200 or SR300
